languages.text: "Она... она превратила целый мир в забойник для {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксов{/g}! Людей забирают из поселений, якобы во дворец, и их больше никто не видит! Ее слуги что-то льют на поля и после этого люди сходят с ума, слышат голоса и видят злых духов! И пока мы гибнем, она сидит за своими белеными стенами и пирует на наших костях!"

traits.locale_text: "Она... она превратила целый мир в забойник для гроксов! Людей забирают из поселений, якобы во дворец, и их больше никто не видит! Ее слуги что-то льют на поля и после этого люди сходят с ума, слышат голоса и видят бесов! И пока мы гибнем, она сидит за своими белеными стенами и пирует на наших костях!"

languages.text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"
languages.original_text: "Она... она превратила целый мир в забойник для {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксов{/g}! Людей забирают из поселений, якобы во дворец, и их больше никто не видит! Ее слуги что-то льют на поля и после этого люди сходят с ума, слышат голоса и видят злых духов! И пока мы гибнем, она сидит за своими белеными стенами и пирует на наших костях!"

traits.locale_text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like grox from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

"She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like grox from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

"She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

languages.text: 「総督は…総督は星全体で大虐殺をやってる！開拓地から人間が{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}みたいにかき集められて、たぶん宮殿に連れて行かれて、それきり二度と姿を見せないんだ！総督の家来が地面中に何かを撒くと、人々は気がおかしくなって…悪霊の声や姿が分かるようになってくるんだ！僕らが死んでいく間にも、総督は白い壁の向こうに座っていて、僕らの骨を貪っているんだ！」
languages.original_text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

traits.locale_text: 「総督は…総督は星全体で大虐殺をやってる！開拓地から人間が{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}みたいにかき集められて、たぶん宮殿に連れて行かれて、それきり二度と姿を見せないんだ！総督の家来が地面中に何かを撒くと、人々は気がおかしくなって…悪霊の声や姿が分かるようになってくるんだ！僕らが死んでいく間にも、総督は白い壁の向こうに座っていて、僕らの骨を貪っているんだ！」

languages.text: “她……她把这个世界变成了屠宰场！那些人就像{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}一样，被人集中起来，从定居点带走了。说是要把他们带到宫殿里，之后就再也没有人见过他们！她的爪牙在田地里灌了些什么东西，然后人们就开始发疯了！他们开始听到奇怪的声音，还会看到恶灵！等我们要死的时候，她就会坐在她的白墙后面，啃食我们的骨头！”
languages.original_text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

traits.locale_text: “她……她把这个世界变成了屠宰场！那些人就像{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}一样，被人集中起来，从定居点带走了。说是要把他们带到宫殿里，之后就再也麻油人见过他们！她的爪牙在田地里灌了些什么东西，然后人们就开始发疯了！他们开始听到奇怪的声音，还会看到恶灵！等我们要死的时候，她就会坐在她的白墙后面，啃食我们的骨头！”

languages.text: «¡Por su culpa este mundo se ha convertido en un matadero! La gente viene de los asentamientos en manada, como si fueran {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}, supuestamente para ir a palacio... ¡y no se les vuelve a ver el pelo! Sus siervos les echan algo a los campos que vuelve loca a la gente; ¡empiezan a oír voces y ver espíritus malignos! Y mientras el pueblo se muere, ¡ella se queda tan pancha, detrás de sus muros blancos, dándose caprichos a nuestra costa!».
languages.original_text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por su culpa este mundo se ha convertido en un matadero! La gente viene de los asentamientos en manada, como si fueran {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}, supuestamente para ir a palacio... ¡y no se les vuelve a ver el pelo! Sus siervos les echan algo a los campos que vuelve loca a la gente; ¡empiezan a oír voces y ver espíritus malignos! Y mientras el pueblo se muere, ¡ella se queda tan pancha, detrás de sus muros blancos, dándose caprichos a nuestra costa!».

languages.text: "Sie ... sie hat die ganze Welt in ein Schlachthaus verwandelt! Die Menschen werden in den Ansiedlungen zusammengetrieben wie {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}, angeblich, um in den Palast zu gehen, und dann werden sie nie wieder gesehen! Ihre Diener kippen etwas auf den Feldern aus, und die Menschen verlieren den Verstand – sie hören plötzliche Stimmen und sehen böse Geister! Und während wir sterben, sitzt sie hinter ihren weißen Mauern und labt sich an unseren Knochen!"
languages.original_text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie ... sie hat die ganze Welt in ein Schlachthaus verwandelt! Die Menschen werden in den Ansiedlungen zusammengetrieben wie {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}, angeblich, um in den Palast zu gehen, und dann werden sie nie wieder gesehen! Ihre Diener kippen etwas auf den Feldern aus, und die Menschen verlieren den Verstand – sie hören plötzliche Stimmen und sehen böse Geister! Und während wir sterben, sitzt sie hinter ihren weißen Mauern und labt sich an unseren Knochen!"

languages.text: « Elle... Elle a transformé le monde entier en abattoir ! Les habitants des villages sont regroupés comme des {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} pour être envoyés au palais, mais ensuite, on les revoit plus jamais ! Ses serviteurs versent quelque chose dans les champs et les gens perdent la tête... Ils entendent des voix et croient voir des démons partout ! Et pendant qu'on se fait massacrer, elle se repaît de nos carcasses, tranquillement installée derrière ses murs blancs ! »
languages.original_text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

traits.locale_text: « Elle... Elle a transformé le monde entier en abattoir ! Les habitants des villages sont regroupés comme des {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} pour être envoyés au palais, mais ensuite, on les revoit plus jamais ! Ses serviteurs versent quelque chose dans les champs et les gens perdent la tête... Ils entendent des voix et croient voir des démons partout ! Et pendant qu'on se fait massacrer, elle se repaît de nos carcasses, tranquillement installée derrière ses murs blancs ! »

languages.text: "Koca dünyayı mezbahaya çevirdi! Yerleşim yerlerindeki insanlar {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} gibi toplatılıyor, saraya götürüldükleri söyleniyor ama onları bir daha gören veya duyan olmuyor! Hizmetkârları tarlalara bir şeyler serpiyor, sonra da insanlar aklını kaçırıyor. Sesler duymaya, şeytani ruhlar görmeye başlıyorlar. Biz burada ölürken de o, beyaz duvarlarının ardında oturup kemiklerimizi mideye indiriyor!"
languages.original_text: "She... she's turned the whole world into a slaughterhouse! People are rounded up like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} from the settlements, supposedly to go to the palace, and they're never seen again! Her servants pour something over the fields and then people lose their minds — they start hearing voices and seeing evil spirits! And while we're dying, she's sitting behind her white walls and feasting on our bones!"

Yerleşim yerlerindeki insanlar {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} gibi toplatılıyor, saraya götürüldükleri söyleniyor ama onları bir daha gören veya duyan olmuyor! Hizmetkârları tarlalara bir şeyler serpiyor, sonra da insanlar aklını kaçırıyor. Sesler duymaya, şeytani ruhlar görmeye başlıyorlar.
